posts.post_content:
Greetings to my fellow Monster enthusiasts. 

I have the following three cards available for sale:

1.)  Mathewson "dark cap" - Polar Bear (SGC 1.5) ... $295
2.)  Joss "portrait" ... $135
3.)  Chesbro ... $115

All pieces are being made available on a first come, first served basis. As the saying goes: "A commitment to buy takes precedence over any ongoing negotiation".

All prices are delivered to your door. Forms of payment are PP FF or check.

Thank you!

Derek

The trio is sold. Thank you very much.

Derek
